actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to remove certain limitations on the estate tax marital deduction in certain cases.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide an unlimited estate tax marital deduction where both the decedent and surviving spouse attained age 72 before the decedent's death and the couple was married for 20 years or more.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to remove certain limitations on the estate tax marital deduction in certain cases.
